translation.en: Another prank? Why do you have to keep doing this?
translation.zh: 你又搞恶作剧了？ 你为什么一直搞恶作剧？

translation.en: I got you good, didn't I?
You being the big man of the house and taking care of your mum?
translation.zh: 你作为家里的男人 照顾妈妈了吗？

translation.en: More like scaring his old mom.
The shoe trick. Now, let me see.
No, I think you must be mistaking me with someone else, mate.
translation.zh:
不对 你肯定记错了
不是我教你的 哥们
不能再聊了 亲爱的

translation.en: I've gotta take some clients out for dinner.
translation.zh: 我得带客户出去吃晚餐

translation.en: But I just wanted to check in on my two favorite people,
translation.zh: 我就是打来关心一下我最爱的两个人

translation.en: and let you know that I miss you both and I love you guys so much.
translation.zh: 我想你们 我非常爱你们

-爱你 爸爸
-再见 小伙子

translation.en: You know, it's the third time this week you've been late.
translation.zh: 这是你本周第三次晚回家了

translation.en: I've just got to finish these deadlines, then I'm done. I promise.
translation.zh: 赶完这些工作我就下班 我保证

translation.en: maybe I can find a way to make it up to you.
Well, Friday night, we do have the nanny.
translation.zh: 星期五晚上保姆会过来

translation.en: Well, then I will see you on Friday night, lady.
translation.zh: 那我们星期五晚上见 女士
你刚刚真的害怕了吗 妈妈？

translation.en: But next time, let's get your dad.
Looks like Mr. Brown could use a cuddle.
translation.zh: 看来布朗先生需要人抱抱

translation.en: I'm too old to still sleep with a Teddy bear.
translation.zh: 我这么大了 不能抱着泰迪熊睡了

translation.en: Well, I won't tell if you won't.
translation.zh: 你不告诉别人 我也不告诉别人

translation.en: If you're trying to scare me again, it's not funny.
translation.zh: 你别再吓我了 这一点也不好笑

translation.en: I thought we could take a look at some of those toys today.
translation.zh: 我想着我们今天可以看看这些玩具

translation.en: Or perhaps there's something you'd like to talk about?
You don't like coming here very much, do you?
translation.zh: 你不是很喜欢来这里 对吗？

translation.en: But you do understand why you're here?
translation.zh: 但你明白自己为什么要来吧？

translation.en: You know, Jude, if you'd like to go,
translation.zh: 裘德 如果你想离开 你只需要说

translation.en: all you need to do is to say: "I'd like to go now."
translation.zh: 裘德 如果你想离开 你只需要说 你现在想离开

translation.en: Five months isn't an unusual time for this kind of selective mutism.
translation.zh:
（我现在想离开） 选择性缄默症患儿
五个月不说话不算特殊

translation.en: I've seen children stop talking for much longer
translation.zh: 我见过更长时间不说话的孩子

translation.en: Encourage him to communicate, but try not to force it.
translation.zh: 鼓励他跟人沟通 但尽量不要强迫他

translation.en: It has to come from him.
translation.zh: 必须得他自己敞开心扉才行

translation.en: The more we force things, the more he's gonna pull back.
translation.zh: 我们越强迫他 他越不想说

translation.en: And how are the two of you holding up?
We're good, yeah. As well as we can be.
translation.zh: 我们很好 对 尽量保持好状态

translation.en: We're really just trying to focus on Jude's recovery right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在只想专注于裘德的康复情况

translation.en: Well, I commend your dedication. But Jude is looking to you now.
translation.zh:
我认可你们做出的努力
但裘德的病情跟你们息息相关

translation.en: And if you're not getting better, he won't get better.
translation.zh: 你们不好起来 他也不会好起来

translation.en: I thought the doctor had some good things to say.
translation.zh: 我觉得医生的话非常有道理

translation.en: I think Jude is a little better.
No. I meant, actually, about us healing too.
translation.zh: 不 我的意思是 她说我们得好起来
那个 我… 我很好 真的

translation.en: And you don't even let me touch you.
I'm not having this conversation again.
translation.zh: 我… 不想再聊这事了

translation.en: You've never talked about what happened or how you feel.
translation.zh:
你从来没说过发生了什么事
或者你有什么感受

translation.en: Out of the city, some place quiet.
translation.zh: 搬出城 搬到一个安静的地方

translation.en: You're already homeschooling Jude. I can work wherever.
translation.zh:
你已经在家教裘德学习了
我在哪里工作都行了

translation.en: I think it would be a good chance for us to have a fresh start.
translation.zh:
这是个好机会
我们可以有个新的开始

translation.en: Hiya! I'm Pamela. I'm glad you found it.
translation.zh: 你们好 我是帕梅拉 很高兴你们没迷路

translation.en: Shall I show you the house? And what's this little man's name?
translation.zh:
我带你们看看房子吧？ -这个小家伙叫什么名字？
-裘德

-这个小家伙叫什么名字？
-裘德

translation.en: Well, I bet we'll be best of friends in no time.
translation.zh: 相信我们很快会成为好朋友的

translation.en: This used to be a guesthouse of a much larger property.
translation.zh: 这里以前是客房 是大庄园的一部分

translation.en: But after the owner of the manor house passed away,
translation.zh:
但在庄园主人过世之后
没有冒犯的意思 一个城里人来了

translation.en: some city man, no offense, came and scooped it up.
translation.zh:
但在庄园主人过世之后
没有冒犯的意思 一个城里人来了 他买下了这里

translation.en: I think he was gonna restore it, but I imagine the job got too much for him.
translation.zh:
他应该是想整修这里 不过据我猜测
因为工作量太大而搁置了

translation.en: Lucky for you folks, though. Some time in the countryside.
translation.zh: 你们真幸运 朋友们 有时间来乡下玩玩

translation.en: -It's perfect. -I'll give you a little tour if you like.
translation.zh:
这里很好 -我可以带你们参观一下
-不用了

translation.en: No. I think we can handle it from here.
translation.zh:
-我可以带你们参观一下
-不用了 -剩下的事我们自己来吧
-好的

-剩下的事我们自己来吧
-好的

translation.en: And what about you, big boss?
I vote we try a little…

translation.zh:
-很漂亮 不是吗？
-非常漂亮

translation.en: Smell the air. That's fresh air.
translation.zh: 闻闻看 空气很清新

translation.en: I bet we'll see loads of rabbits come spring.
That must be the main house.
Now that is what I call a house. Come here.
This place must've been quite something back in the day.
translation.zh: 这房子过去肯定赫赫有名
裘德 来跟我们一起玩啊

translation.en: We'll have to look it up.
Old house like this probably got some real history to it.
translation.zh: 这种房子可能有些历史
裘德 你可以抱我吗？

translation.en: Yeah, forget the guesthouse. I'm moving in here.
translation.zh: 别管什么客房了 我要搬来这里

translation.en: Mate, don't run off like that, please.
translation.zh: 哥们 拜托别这样乱跑

translation.en: You can't run off like that, not out here.
translation.zh: 你不能那样乱跑 在这里可不行

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. It's filthy. Look at it.

translation.zh: 你到底是在哪里找到的？

translation.en: Okay. Let's get it cleaned up first.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们先把它洗干净

translation.en: All right. Can't wait to have this guy in the house.
translation.zh: 好吧 等不及带它回家了

translation.en: I bet you have a story to tell.
translation.zh: 你肯定是个有故事的玩偶

translation.en: Looks like he wants a friend.
He looks like he was broken before…
translation.zh: 它之前好像被人摔坏了

translation.en: Okay, let's go to bed now.
translation.zh: 好了 我们现在去睡觉吧

translation.en: You sure you got everything you need there, little fella? Yeah?
translation.zh: 你确定你什么都不缺吗 小家伙？

translation.en: You just make yourself at home. Put your feet up.
translation.zh:
别拘束 就像在自己家一样
好好放松一下

translation.en: There's nice, cold beer in the fridge.
I could use some of those pj's.
I guess it's about time for me to start my morning commute
translation.zh: 我现在去上班 可能有点晚了

translation.en: all the way down the hallway.
translation.zh: 我得一路走到走廊那头

translation.en: I really hope there's no traffic, guys.
You wanna stop by the office for lunch today?
translation.zh:
你今天想来我办公室
跟我一起吃午餐吗？

translation.en: Did I mention that I was just down the hallway?
translation.zh: 我刚说了我办公室在走廊那头吧？

translation.en: I'll try to sneak by. Goodbye, Judester.
translation.zh:
-我会偷偷去找你的
-再见 裘德

translation.en: Did we come up with a name for him yet?
That's quite the name. How'd you come up with that?
translation.zh: 这名字真不错 你怎么想到的？

translation.en: He told you. Oh, right, yeah.
Well, of course, he did. Silly me.
translation.zh: 当然是它告诉你的 我太笨了
好了 再见 两位

translation.en: Well, what should we start with today, math or history?
translation.zh: 我们今天先学什么？数学还是历史？

translation.en: I told you not to run off like that.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你不要这样乱跑！

translation.en: This is where you found him?
translation.zh: 你就是在这儿找到它的吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. We're staying at the guesthouse.
translation.zh: 对不起 我们住在客房里

translation.en: We were just on a walk. I didn't know.
translation.zh: 我们只是在散步 我不知道…

translation.en: Of course you didn't. You're the new family.
translation.zh: 当然了 你们是新搬来的

translation.en: Sorry, I get a lot of people snooping around up here.
translation.zh: 抱歉 经常有人偷跑来这里

translation.en: I'm Joseph. Joe. I tend the grounds around here.
translation.zh: 听着 我是乔瑟夫 叫我乔吧 我负责看管周围的土地

translation.en: Part guard, part gardener. This is Oz.
translation.zh: 我既是守卫 也是园丁 这是奥兹

translation.en: I'm Liza. And this is Jude.
translation.zh: 我是丽莎 他是裘德

translation.en: We can put the doll back.
translation.zh: 我们可以把玩偶放回去

translation.en: Keep it. No one's gonna miss it out here.
translation.zh: 留着吧 放这里也没人要

translation.en: Just me and Oz these days.
translation.zh: 这里目前只有我和奥兹

translation.en: Unless, of course, you'd like to put it back?
Don't worry about that. Not much of a talker myself.
translation.zh: 别担心 我话也不多

translation.en: People think I'm crazy for living out here on my own,
translation.zh:
我自己在这里生活
他们都觉得我疯了

translation.en: but I'm more sane than any of them.
The real crazy is living in the city, packed together like a bunch of cattle.
translation.zh:
住在城市里 像牛一样挤在一起的人
才是疯子

translation.en: Thank you, but no, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 不过大可不必

translation.en: You didn't really have to walk us all the way back.
translation.zh: 你其实不用一路送我们回来的

translation.en: I don't mind. We're neighbors now.
translation.zh: 没关系的 我们现在是邻居了

translation.en: I suppose I'll be seeing quite a bit of you.
translation.zh: 我们应该会经常见面的

translation.en: Joseph, this is my husband, Sean.
translation.zh: 乔瑟夫 这是我丈夫肖恩

translation.en: I tend the grounds round here. Keep the troublemakers out.
translation.zh:
我负责看管周围的土地
不让外人入内

translation.en: -Caught these two red-handed. -Yeah, these two are trouble, all right.
translation.zh: 正好抓他们个现行 这两个人很麻烦吧？

translation.en: Well, thanks for escorting them back.
Right. I'll be off, then. Let me know if you need anything, yeah?
translation.zh: 那好吧 你们需要帮忙就告诉我

translation.en: -Yeah. Nice meeting you. -Pleasure was all mine.
translation.zh:
-好的 很高兴认识你
-我也是

translation.en: Bringing home the local strays already, huh?
translation.zh: 已经开始带本地的流浪汉回家了？

translation.en: Look, he insisted on walking us all the way home.

translation.zh: 走了 奥兹 走了

translation.en: Who the hell buries a doll in the woods like that?
translation.zh: 谁会那样把玩偶埋在树林里呢？

translation.en: Maybe some weird little kid put it there.
translation.zh: 可能是某个奇怪的小孩放的吧

translation.en: Yeah, but you weren't there. You didn't see it.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你当时不在 你没看到

translation.en: Okay. So, what do you wanna do?
translation.zh: 好吧 所以你有什么打算？

translation.en: You wanna take the doll away from him?
translation.zh: 你想把他的玩偶拿走吗？

translation.en: I just think it's all a little bit…
I really don't think it's the doll that's the problem here.
translation.zh: 我觉得有问题的不是那个玩偶

translation.en: Nothing. Let's just finish the dishes, yeah?
translation.zh: 没什么 我们先把碗洗完 好吗？

translation.en: I've got some work to do before we go to sleep.
translation.zh: 睡觉前还有些工作要做

translation.en: No, I wanna hear what you were about to say.
translation.zh: 不 说吧 你刚才想说的话

translation.en: Sometimes I feel like you use Jude…
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得你在拿裘德当挡箭牌

translation.en: to avoid talking about what happened to you.
translation.zh: 回避谈论你身上发生的事情

translation.en: And I don't think that's healthy for either of you.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样对你们两个都不利
那是一场目标随机的入室抢劫

translation.en: And I'm actually aware of that every single day of my life.
translation.zh: 事后每一天 那个场景都在我脑海里
是 但事情已经过去了

translation.en: Dogs bark. You didn't like the dog?
I know what you mean. He was kind of scary.
translation.zh: 我知道 我害怕那条狗

translation.en: Should we just leave him alone? Do you wanna open the door?
translation.zh:
我们别打扰他
还是你想打开门看看？

translation.en: No, I wanna go in. I wanna see if he'll talk to us.
translation.zh:
不 我想进去看看
他会不会跟我们说话

translation.en: We were just outside, and we thought we heard you talking.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚在门外好像听到你说话了
你在跟勃拉姆斯说话吗？

translation.en: So, what were you guys talking about?

translation.zh: （勃拉姆斯不喜欢它） 勃拉姆斯不喜欢它？

translation.en: We'll let you get back to Brahms.
translation.zh: 你继续跟勃拉姆斯玩吧

translation.en: Thinking about watching a movie, if you're interested.
translation.zh: 我想去看电影 你想看吗？

translation.en: I guess we're keeping that doll.
translation.zh: 看来我们要留下那个玩偶了

translation.en: Are you kidding? I love that creepy thing.
translation.zh:
你在开玩笑吗？
我喜欢那个恐怖的玩偶

translation.en: Liza, it's okay. Honey, it's okay. Look at me.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 没事了 看着我

translation.en: Look at me. It's fine. You're okay.
translation.zh: 看着我 没事了 好吗？
你还好吗？又做噩梦了吗？

translation.en: He slept in his room, love.
This is the first time he's slept in his own bed.
translation.zh: 他第一次睡在自己的床上

translation.en: Come on. Let's go back to bed.
translation.zh: 好了 我们回去睡吧

translation.en: Here you go. Do you want two, yeah?
translation.zh: 给你 你要两个 对吗？
早上好 你起来了？我故意没叫你
你起来了？我故意没叫你

translation.en: It seemed like you could use it.
Cooked up a little full English.
Well, apparently, Brahms is handing down rules now,
translation.zh: 显然是勃拉姆斯在发布规则

translation.en: including he'd like his own food.
Jude, buddy, did you do this?
translation.zh: 裘德？ 哥们 是你干的吗？

translation.en: It's not very nice to blame him now, is it?
Look, we're not mad at you.
translation.zh: 听着 我们不是生你的气

translation.en: But this is no way to treat your things.
translation.zh: 但这样弄坏玩具是不对的

translation.en: And it's never okay to lie.
So, did you cut up Mr. Brown?
translation.zh: 所以是你把布朗先生剪坏的吗？

translation.en: Okay. Then why don't you go to your room and finish your homework there?
translation.zh: 好吧 回你的房间把作业写完吧

translation.en: And then when you're ready to tell me what happened, you can come out.
translation.zh: 等你准备好告诉我真相时再出来

translation.en: You can leave the doll here.
You heard your mum. Leave the doll, please.
translation.zh: 听你妈的话 把玩偶放下吧

translation.en: Maybe it's a good thing. He's getting his anger out.
translation.zh: 也许是件好事 他把愤怒发泄出来了

translation.en: You're supposed to stay in this room,
and not come out again until you're ready to apologize.
translation.zh: 在你没准备好道歉之前 别再出来了

translation.en: Fine. You can stay in here for the rest of the day, then.
translation.zh: （我没出去过） 好 那你今天就待在房间里

translation.en: your father and I said no doll.
translation.zh: 我和你爸都说了 不许拿玩偶！

translation.en: Okay, I am gonna count to three, and if this door isn't open…
translation.zh: 好的 我数到三 如果你不开门…

translation.en: I have someone here who wants to apologize.
Okay. Let's get you to bed, yeah?
Go brush your teeth. Good boy.
I could've sworn I saw somebody go into his room, and then…
translation.zh: 我发誓我看见有人进了他的房间

translation.en: Honestly, his pranks are getting out of hand.
translation.zh: 说真的 他总喜欢恶作剧

translation.en: Yeah, but I thought everything would be better
translation.zh: 对 我还以为情况会好起来

translation.en: once we got out of the city.
translation.zh: 对 我还以为情况会好起来 只要我们出了城

translation.en: I don't know what to do.
I just feel like I'm letting you and Jude down.
translation.zh: 我感觉我让你和裘德失望了
你没有让任何人失望 拜托别愧疚

translation.en: You'll feel better after some sleep. Yeah.
translation.zh:
-睡一觉吧 睡醒就好多了
-好

translation.en: I understand that some of Jude's recent behaviors would be upsetting.
translation.zh: 我明白裘德最近的行为让人困扰

translation.en: But the doll clearly is providing him with a safe outlet to process his trauma.
translation.zh:
但是很显然 这个玩偶让他有了一个
走出创伤的安全出口

translation.en: Now comes the hard part, where he might try to act out some more.
translation.zh: 目前最难的是他或许会试着扮演…

translation.en: Listen, what if we just got rid of the doll? How bad would that be?
translation.zh:
如果我们直接把玩偶扔掉呢？
情况会有多糟？

translation.en: I urge you to be patient, and allow him to have his friend.
translation.zh: 我劝你耐心点 让他有自己的朋友

translation.en: He's found a place with this doll where he feels safe.
translation.zh: 他觉得跟玩偶在一起是安全的

translation.en: And the last thing we want to do is take that away.
translation.zh: 他最不希望我们拿走他的玩偶

translation.en: I'll send you some links with further information.
translation.zh: 我会再给你们发一些资料的链接
好的 好主意 谢谢你 医生

translation.en: Thanks, doc. We'll speak to you soon, yeah?
translation.zh:
好的 好主意 谢谢你 医生 -再联系 好吗？
-好的 保重

-再联系 好吗？
-好的 保重

translation.en: That's it. One, and then move it on. Perfect.
translation.zh: 没错 这样一下 继续 非常好

translation.en: You thought of a name for him yet?
Because that's his name, isn't it? What else would it be?
translation.zh: 它就叫这个 不是吗？ 它还能叫什么呢？

translation.en: You've scrubbed up well, little man.
translation.zh: 你把它擦得很干净 小伙子

translation.en: So, I see you've found yourself a new family.
translation.zh: 看来你又给自己找了个新家庭

translation.en: Just look at that expression on his face.
It's like he's got a secret that only he knows.
translation.zh: 仿佛它有一个不为人知的秘密

translation.en: Oh, hello there. I was just looking for Oz, my daft dog.
translation.zh: 你好 我只是在找奥兹 我的狗

translation.en: -We haven't seen him. -All right, never mind.
translation.zh:
-我们没看见
-好吧 反正我知道它会跑去哪里

translation.en: Pretty good idea where he'll be, anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我知道它会跑去哪里

translation.en: Come on. It's time to go inside.
You left Jude outside all alone? I just left him for a second.
translation.zh:
-你让裘德自己待在外面吗？
-我就离开了一会儿

translation.en: I just saw it. It was just there.
translation.zh: 我刚看到它了 它在那边 对不起

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -My God, Liza. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 丽莎 你在这里做什么？
我会永远跟你在一起的

（如果他们试图送走我
他们会后悔的） 他们会后悔的

translation.en: I didn't know you were standing there.
No. It's just the three of us for dinner tonight, Jude.
translation.zh:
没有它的 今晚只有我们三人吃饭
裘德

translation.en: -No, not tonight. -Does it really matter, Liza?
translation.zh: 不 今晚不行 没关系的 丽莎
你妈妈说了不行 哥们

translation.en: So, I was thinking of inviting Liam out, and the family.
translation.zh: 我一直想邀请利亚姆一家过来玩

translation.en: Felt like maybe we could use some company.
No? You wanna see your uncle Liam, auntie Mary, and your cousins?
translation.zh:
好吗？想你的利亚姆叔叔、玛丽婶婶
还有堂兄妹了吗？

translation.en: I think it'll be fun. He's always a good laugh, isn't he?
translation.zh:
应该会很有意思的
利亚姆总是很搞笑

translation.en: I think he'd love to get out of the city.

translation.zh: （不招待客人） 他们不算客人 他们是家人 对吧？

translation.en: Your dad and I make the rules in this house, not your doll.
translation.zh:
在这栋房子里 我和你爸爸制定规则
而不是你的玩偶

translation.en: -All right, come on. Enough. -No, it's fine.
translation.zh: 好了 够了！ 不 没关系

translation.en: You can sit here until you decide you can eat your food.
translation.zh:
你可以坐在这里 等你做了决定
再吃东西

translation.en: Just do as your mum says, please.
translation.zh: 听你妈妈的话 拜托

translation.en: It's okay. It's fine. You have work to do.
translation.zh: 没事 你还有工作要做

translation.en: Well, if you won't talk to me, will the doll?
translation.zh:
如果你不跟我说话
玩偶会跟我说话吗？

translation.en: That's because Brahms is not a person.
He doesn't need any food. You do.
translation.zh: 它不需要吃东西 可你需要

translation.en: The doll and his rules do not run this house.
translation.zh:
（你在破坏规则） 在这栋房子里 它说了不算
它的规则不管用

translation.en: Fine. Stay here all night, then.
translation.zh: （你在惹它生气） 好吧 你在这里待一整晚吧

translation.en: Liza, what in the hell happened?
Look, I believe you, I do. It's just…
translation.zh: 听着 我相信你 真的 只是…

translation.en: It's not really surprising, is it? Considering what he's been through.
translation.zh:
我是说真让人吃惊 是吧？
考虑到他经历了什么

translation.en: The dog? There is no dog here.
Sean, there was a drawing of Jude standing over our dead bodies
translation.zh:
肖恩 有一幅画是裘德站在我们的尸体旁
他手里拿着一把枪！

translation.en: and he was holding a gun.
translation.zh:
有一幅画是裘德站在我们的尸体旁
他手里拿着一把枪！

translation.en: So, you're saying he ripped pages out of his book?
translation.zh: 你是说他把那几页撕掉了？

translation.en: I just know that I want that doll out of our house.
translation.zh: 我只想把那个玩偶丢出家门

translation.en: Look, you need to slow down. I need to think about this.
translation.zh: 丽莎 拜托 让他留着玩偶吧

translation.en: No, I don't want it here.
translation.zh: 不 我不想留它在家里

translation.en: I don't like what it's doing to Jude.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢它对裘德做的事

translation.en: This is a lot for a little kid, don't you think?
translation.zh: 一个孩子很难做到 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: This isn't a light table, for starters.
Are you asking me if I did this?
translation.zh: 你是在问是不是我干的吗？

translation.en: Somebody's done this. You're the only person in here with him.
translation.zh: 肯定是有人干的 只有你跟他在一起

translation.en: No! Something is happening to him.
And it started with that doll.
translation.zh: 从他捡到那个玩偶开始！

translation.en: Fine. We'll get rid of the doll in the morning, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 我们明早把玩偶扔掉 好吗？

translation.en: What are we gonna do about them, Brahms?
translation.zh: 我们要拿他们怎么办 勃拉姆斯？
奥兹 你在哪里 孩子？

translation.en: Come here, Oz. Come here, boy.
translation.zh: 过来 奥兹 孩子

translation.en: Lovely. I need that. Thank you.
translation.zh: 真好 我正想喝 谢谢

-准备好了吗？
-好了 我们行动吧
（你们应该遵守规则的） 肖恩

translation.en: Come on, buddy! It's not funny. Jude!
translation.zh:
出来 哥们！
这一点也不好笑 裘德！

我走这边 -你走那边
-好的

translation.en: We'll circle round. We'll meet back at the house.
translation.zh: 我们找一圈 在家里会合
来跟我们一起玩啊 妈妈

translation.en: I'm sorry I scared you. We were just playing, mommy.
translation.zh:
对不起 我吓到你了
我们在玩呢 妈妈

translation.en: It's so good to hear your voice.
translation.zh: 听到你的声音真是太好了

translation.en: There you are. Been looking all over for you. Didn't you hear us calling?
translation.zh:
你在这里 我们在到处找你
你没听见我们喊你吗？

translation.en: Jude. What the hell are you doing in here? It's not safe.
translation.zh:
裘德 你在这里做什么？
这里不安全！

translation.en: Right, let's go. We're not really supposed to be in this part of the house.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走 我们真不该进来这里

translation.en: It's so nice to hear you talking.
translation.zh: 听到你说话真是太好了

translation.en: Joseph, what happened in this house?
translation.zh: 乔瑟夫 这栋房子发生了什么事？

translation.en: Jude, why don't you go show Brahms the music room?
translation.zh: 裘德 你带勃拉姆斯去音乐房吧

translation.en: There… There was a family that lived here a long time ago.
translation.zh: 很久之前 这里住着一家人

translation.en: Had a son, went a bit mad.
translation.zh: 他们的儿子精神有点不正常

translation.en: Got burnt up in fire. Wore a mask to hide it.
translation.zh:
他的脸被烧伤了
所以他戴上面具隐藏伤疤

translation.en: Lived inside the walls of the house for 30 years. Never came out.
translation.zh: 他在墙里住了30年 从来没出来过

translation.en: Drowned themselves. It's a very sad story.
translation.zh: 溺水而亡 非常悲伤的故事

translation.en: Well, it all got a bit messy after the parents had gone.
translation.zh: 他父母死后 情况有些混乱

translation.en: He killed a man, very nearly two others,
translation.zh:
他杀了一个人
另外两个人也差点被他杀死

translation.en: But they're all dead and buried now.
translation.zh: 他们都死了 被埋葬了

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to keep it from you.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不是故意瞒着你们

translation.en: I just didn't think it'd ever come up.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不是故意瞒着你们 我只是没想到会发生这种事

translation.en: Come on, Jude. It's time to go home.
translation.zh: 过来 裘德 我们该回家了

translation.en: Did you ever find your dog?
Yes, I did. I'm afraid Oz was found gutted in the forest.
translation.zh:
对 找到了 奥兹死在了树林里
内脏被掏空了

translation.en: So, your parents tell me you've been talking again.
translation.zh: 你父母告诉我你重新开始说话了？

translation.en: Is this your new friend Brahms? He seems like a very nice friend.
translation.zh:
这是你的新朋友勃拉姆斯吗？
看起来它是个非常友好的朋友

translation.en: What are some of the things you talk about?
He tells me all sorts of things.
translation.zh: 它告诉我各种各样的事情

translation.en: Sometimes he tells me about the other families he's lived with.
translation.zh: 有时它会讲讲跟它一起生活过的家庭

translation.en: Has he lived with a lot of families?
translation.zh: 它跟很多家庭一起生活过吗？

translation.en: He wants to live with us now.
translation.zh: 它现在想跟我们一起住

translation.en: He was very angry that mommy and daddy wanted to take him away.
translation.zh:
它非常生气 因为我爸爸妈妈
要把它送走

这样啊 勃拉姆斯生气的时候会说
要伤害什么人或者要做什么事吗？

translation.en: does he say he wants to hurt someone or something?
translation.zh:
勃拉姆斯生气的时候会说
要伤害什么人或者要做什么事吗？

translation.en: Is there something he wants to tell your mum and dad?
translation.zh: 它有什么话想跟你父母说吗？

translation.en: Well, if Jude had something to do with the dog's death,
translation.zh: 如果裘德跟狗的死有关

translation.en: then this is a lot more serious than we thought.
translation.zh: 如果裘德跟狗的死有关 那么事情比我们想的要严重很多

translation.en: The doll might be enabling him to shift blame
translation.zh: 那个玩偶可能是他做了坏事后

translation.en: for all the bad things that he might do.
I think it would be a good idea for me to see him face-to-face.
translation.zh: 我觉得让我跟他当面聊聊比较好

translation.en: When do you think you can bring him down to London?
translation.zh: 你们什么时候可以带他来伦敦？

translation.en: We've got guests coming today, but we'll bring him as soon as we can.
translation.zh:
今天有客人来我们家 -我们会尽快带他过去的
-那好吧

-我们会尽快带他过去的
-那好吧

translation.en: But I urge you, keep a close eye on him in the meanwhile.
translation.zh: 我劝你们在这期间密切关注他

translation.en: -Come on in, girls. -All right. -Make yourself at home. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-艾米丽 这边都准备好了
-好的 谢谢

translation.en: This is just fabulous! I love it.
You remember your old uncle Liam, don't you?
translation.zh: 还记得你的叔叔利亚姆吗？

translation.en: What? It's not my fault he's mental.
translation.zh:
-你好
-干什么？不怪我 是他精神有问题

translation.en: Well, hello there, Brahms. Pleased to meet you.
translation.zh: 你好啊 勃拉姆斯 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Any friend of Jude's is a friend of mine.
translation.zh: 裘德的朋友就是我的朋友

translation.en: Okay, children, why don't we go outside and play
translation.zh:
好了 孩子们 你们出去玩吧
我们要…

translation.en: while we all have a catch-up.
translation.zh:
好了 孩子们 你们出去玩吧
我们要… -我们要小聚一下
-好的

translation.en: There's nothing to do outside. There's nature. All right?
translation.zh:
-外面没什么玩的
-拥抱大自然

translation.en: It's like a video game, but real. Go, enjoy.
translation.zh:
好吗？就像玩电子游戏一样
不过是真实的场景 去吧 去玩吧

translation.en: Come on, Jude. Show them around.
translation.zh: 来吧 裘德 带他们四处逛逛

translation.en: -Maybe I should go with them. -Oh, nonsense. They'll be fine.
translation.zh:
-或许我该跟他们一起去
-别闹了 他们不会有事的

translation.en: Just stay close to the house, guys.
This is so cool. Shut up.
Don't touch him, Sophie. He's mental.
translation.zh: 别碰他 苏菲 他精神不正常

translation.en: My parents say you talk to that doll, like it's a real person.
translation.zh: 我们父母说你跟那个玩偶说话 仿佛它是个真人

translation.en: Because you went crazy when your mum got attacked.
translation.zh: 当看到你妈妈被袭击时 你就疯了

translation.en: And we're not supposed to notice.
And your stupid doll, he's the most mental of all.
translation.zh: 但最不正常的是你那个玩偶

translation.en: It'll do him good to hang out with some other children.
translation.zh: 跟别的孩子出去玩对他有好处

translation.en: Ever since it happened, I just…
translation.zh: 自从发生了那件事 我就…

translation.en: Hey, you're with family now. You don't have anything to worry about.
translation.zh: 现在家人都陪在你身边 没什么可担心的

translation.en: And Will won't let anything happen.

translation.zh: 喂 你把它弄坏了！ 闭嘴 疯子

translation.en: You're sticking up for your nutter boyfriend now.
translation.zh: 你现在就替你的疯子男友说话了吗？

translation.en: Maybe I should just smash your doll.
translation.zh: 或许我应该砸你的玩偶

translation.en: -Maybe that will make you normal again. -Don't.
translation.zh: 或许那样你就可以恢复正常了 不要

translation.en: We get to this party, and we have literally just walked in the door,
translation.zh: 我们去参加派对 刚走进门

translation.en: and his pants split right in the bum.
And not just a little tear, the whole bum!
translation.zh: 不是小口子 是屁股那儿一整块

translation.en: -I'm going to tell mum! -She'll probably be happy.
translation.zh:
-我要去告诉妈妈！
-她可能会很高兴

translation.en: Or he'll make you wish you never came here.
translation.zh: 我们会让你后悔来了这里

translation.en: -Did you buy him purple boxers? -I did.
translation.zh:
-你给他买了紫色的平脚裤吗？
-是啊

translation.en: Oh, it's good to see that smile again, Liza.
translation.zh: 真好 又看到你的笑容了 丽莎

translation.en: -Give it back! -Nah, I don't think I will.
Why don't you come get it from me, mental?
translation.zh: 你过来抢走啊 疯子？

translation.en: I wouldn't worry about this doll thing.
translation.zh: 我就不会担心那个玩偶

translation.en: Will used to be obsessed with this blanket.
translation.zh: 威尔以前迷恋一条毯子

-跑啊 疯子 跑啊
-别闹了 威尔！

translation.en: Then one day I realized that it was quite literally a security blanket.
translation.zh:
然后有一天我意识到
那条毯子可以给他安全感

translation.en: And I think this doll could be the same thing.
translation.zh: 那个玩偶应该也是这样

translation.en: You shouldn't worry about it, is what I'm saying.
Kids do all sorts of weird things.
translation.zh: 孩子们都会做各种奇怪的事情

translation.en: They go through phases. And then poof, it's gone.
translation.zh:
他们会经历这样的阶段
然后突然间就好了

-我的天啊！
-怎么了？发生什么事了？

translation.en: -Easy, on three. One, two, three. -Mind his head!
Mary, help with his head, okay?
translation.zh: 玛丽 扶着他的头 好吗？

translation.en: Sweetheart, why don't you drink some of this? It'll help you sleep.
translation.zh: 宝贝 喝点这个吧 可以帮助你入睡

translation.en: A nap will do you good.
He wants me to live in the big house with him forever.
translation.zh:
它想让我永远跟它在一起
住在那栋大房子里

translation.en: He said he'd kill you and daddy if I didn't do it.
translation.zh:
它说如果我不照做
就会杀了你和爸爸

translation.en: He says it all the time.
I can't control him anymore. He keeps getting stronger.
translation.zh: 我控制不了它了 它越来越强大了

translation.en: Will… No one's gonna hurt mommy and daddy.
translation.zh: 好吧 没有人伤害得到爸爸和妈妈的

translation.en: And no one's gonna hurt you.

translation.zh: 喂 丽莎 是我 我们刚看了医生

translation.en: We just saw the doctor. I think Will's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 喂 丽莎 是我 我们刚看了医生 威尔应该没事

translation.en: So, I'll call you from the car. All right. I love you. Bye.
translation.zh:
我上车再打给你 好吗？
我爱你 再见

translation.en: Not from around here, are you?
I'm staying at the Glennview Estates. Glennview?
translation.zh:
-我住在格伦维尤庄园
-格伦维尤庄园吗？
你是说希尔谢的庄园吧？

translation.en: Christ, you couldn't pay me money to stop there.
translation.zh: 天啊 给我钱我都不去那里

translation.en: Whole family went completely mad out there.
Something to do with a son living inside the walls for years.
translation.zh:
这和他们的儿子有关
他多年生活在墙壁里

translation.en: You see, but that's not the only thing that happened out there.
translation.zh: 听着 那里还发生过其他事情

translation.en: Back in the '50s, a kid killed his own mother and brother,
translation.zh: 就在1950年代左右 一个孩子杀了自己的母亲和哥哥

translation.en: convinced a doll was speaking to him.
translation.zh: 他相信那个玩偶在跟他说话

translation.en: Last year, that city man that bought it after the Heelshires
translation.zh:
去年 一个城里人
在希尔谢家之后买下了那里

translation.en: went a bit mad and disappeared.
translation.zh: 他有点精神失常 随后人就消失了

translation.en: I saw him down the pub one time.
translation.zh: 我有一次在酒吧见到了他

translation.en: That's what people called him, like. His name were Joseph…
translation.zh: 大家这么叫他 他的名字叫乔瑟夫

translation.en: Didn't have to be like this.
Safer now than he's probably ever been in his life.
translation.zh: 他现在比任何时候都安全

translation.en: I'm here because he wants me to be.
He doesn't like it like this, but you've done it to yourself.
translation.zh: 它不喜欢这样 这都是你自找的

translation.en: I just wanna know where my son is.
translation.zh: 我只想知道我儿子在哪里

translation.en: I will do anything you want. Just give me my son.
translation.zh: 你让我做什么我就做什么 只要你…

translation.en: I want you to listen! He wants you to listen!
translation.zh: 我让你闭嘴！它让你闭嘴！

translation.en: You asked me why I'm here.
translation.zh: 你刚问我为什么来这里？

translation.en: It's the same reason that you are.
translation.zh: 跟你来这里的原因一样

translation.en: He calls out to the ones that need him.
And he was in pieces when I found him,
translation.zh: 我找到它的时候 它支离破碎的

translation.en: Then I heard him, growing inside.
translation.zh: 然后我听到了我内心发出痛苦的声音
裘德肯定听到了 真的

translation.en: I don't know what Brahms is,
translation.zh: 我不知道勃拉姆斯是什么

translation.en: Brahms and Jude are gonna be one, and it'll be beautiful.
translation.zh:
勃拉姆斯和裘德会合二为一
这是一件美事

translation.en: You see, everybody thought that I was crazy.
They thought the Heelshires were crazy, but, no.
translation.zh: 他们觉得希尔谢一家疯了 其实没有

translation.en: Even before the house, before the Davies, the ones before that. I found all their old letters.
translation.zh:
甚至在有那栋房子之前
在戴维斯一家之前 我发现从始至终

translation.en: He knew that you were coming.
translation.zh: 它都知道 你们会来

translation.en: He knew your boy would find him.
translation.zh: 它知道你儿子会找到它

translation.en: That's why he told me to bury him.
translation.zh: 所以它让我把它埋起来

translation.en: They're always so curious, aren't they? The little ones are like…
translation.zh: 小孩子们总是充满好奇心 他们就像…
乔瑟夫 我儿子在哪里？

translation.en: I know you don't wanna hurt anybody.
translation.zh: 我知道你不想伤害任何人
求你了 把它放下吧
我抱着勃拉姆斯 好吗？

translation.en: I used to hold you just like this.
translation.zh: 我以前就是这么抱你的

translation.en: You and daddy have been getting in the way.
translation.zh: 你和爸爸一直碍手碍脚的

translation.en: We're going to live here now…

translation.zh: 因为你们保护不了我们

translation.en: And those men from that night.
We do need Brahms to protect us. It's too late.
translation.zh:
-我们需要勃拉姆斯来保护我们
-太迟了

translation.en: I know Brahms is telling you what to say.
translation.zh: 我知道勃拉姆斯在告诉你说什么

translation.en: Which is why we need to take him home with us.
translation.zh: 所以我们需要带它回家

translation.en: Brahms needs to be a member of our family.
translation.zh: 勃拉姆斯需要成为我们家的一员

translation.en: And what kind of a family doesn't need a mother?
translation.zh: 什么样的家庭不需要妈妈呢？

translation.en: It's me he'll punish. I'm the one who didn't protect him.
translation.zh: 它会惩罚我的 是我没保护好它

translation.en: No. Joseph, Brahms can't hurt you anymore.
translation.zh:
不 不要 乔瑟夫
勃拉姆斯再也不会伤害你了

translation.en: It's gonna be all right, Brahms.
translation.zh: 不会有事的 勃拉姆斯
妈妈 你回来了 是啊 我想你了

translation.en: -Hey, beautiful. How was your day? -It was good.
translation.zh: 美女 今天过得怎么样？ 很好啊 也许我们能跟

translation.en: I think we might sign that author I was telling you about.
translation.zh: 很好啊 也许我们能跟 我之前跟你提过的那个作家签约

translation.en: Wait until you taste it, because I'm pretty confident
translation.zh: 你尝过之后再夸吧 我可非常自信

translation.en: that this might be the greatest coq au vin ever made upon English shores.
translation.zh: 这是我做过最好吃的酒闷仔鸡

translation.en: There's a whole bottle of wine in here, so I'm not sure if…
translation.zh: 我放了一整瓶酒 我不确定…

translation.en: No, okay. I will give you some.
translation.zh: 好吧 我给你盛一点

translation.en: Just two or three hours of my day. Nothing much.
translation.zh: 就做了两三个小时 没什么的

translation.en: Good night, my man. You sleep tight.
translation.zh: 晚安 儿子 祝你好梦
我爱你 宝贝 我也爱你

translation.en: I think we'll be happy here.
translation.zh: 我们在这里会很开心的
前提是他们要遵守规则
